text:
allows the following configuration:

  FileETag ContentMD5 Filename

to generate an ETag based on the md5 digest of the content, and the md5 digest of the filename.
etags generated in this way are cached in a hash.

if ContentDigest is on (to generate "Content-MD5" headers) it looks in the etag cache to get content digests.
creator: sobakasu@gmail.com
